title: Drawing, "American Falls Under a Cloudy Sky, Niagara River", possibly 1856
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at upper right: 2 gold edge brilliant; again at various locations in center  of image:  2 / silver shadow / warm  / silver / gold / glassy [?] / sandy
description:
Recto: Falls shown from the American bank under cloudy sky. 
Verso: Side view of falls under a cloudy sky.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "American Falls Under a Cloudy Sky, Niagara River", possibly 1856.
possibly 1856. Graphite on green wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-150.
